scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const date = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0].replace(/-/g, ''); const folder = path.join('output', date); if (!fs.existsSync(folder)) fs.mkdirSync(folder, { recursive: true }); require('child_process').execSync(`npx jest --json --outputFile=${path.join(folder, 'jest-results.json')}`, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
